imdb.plot outline: Abel and Olivia is a loving and happy couple but before committing to each other, they decide to spend their summer apart. No news, no contact, no phone call, to regain their freedom and live new experiences. But as each day goes by, they understand who they really are and what they really want - Ultimately, Abel and Olivia break up, but the story doesn't end there. The end of the first story becomes the beginning of a new one.
imdb.title: Été
